TEXT.TITLE: STERIVET <STVT> GETS SUPPORT FOR DRUG PROJECT
TEXT.BODY: Sterivet Laboratories Limited said the the National Research Council of Canada is contributing financing for the development a new drug to treat a disease of the feet in horses. It said the drug has produced promising results in limited clinical trials over the past 18 months in Ontario. Reuter
